Container.Name: XMLTV-Schedules-Direct
Container.Overview: An XMLTV installation based on Debian (including cron) with a JSON added grabber for Schedules Direct. [br]This allows use of Schedules Direct for all supported countries. For those not in the know; XMLTV is a set of programs to process TV (tvguide) listings and manage your TV viewing, storing listings in an XML format.[br][br] The JSON grabber currently provided with this docker is tv_grab_sd_json. Recently, it has been officially accepted into the XMLTV project.[br]

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: XMLTV configuration, including caches and cronjobs.

Config.Name: Days To Grab
Config.Description: Number of days to grab when script runs.

Config.Name: Grabber Offset
Config.Description: Offset to apply when script runs.

Config.Name: Days To Grab at Startup
Config.Description: Number of days to grab when docker starts.
